# Preface

This book is intended to be a working book to introduce the concepts of suspect and nontarget analysis with focus on environmental analytical chemistry.  

* Basic knowledge of R programming is a prerequisite to understand some of the codes
* The author do not take responsibility for programs or computer crashing.
